2014-03-11.name: Guardian of Kings

2014-03-11.rule: draw 4 cards .
2014-03-11.flavour: rogues are not good joggers .

2014-03-11.flavour: when deathwing assaulted the capital , this soldier was the only member of his squad to survive . now he 's all bitter and stuff .

2014-03-11.name: War Golem
2014-03-11.flavour: golems are not afraid , but for some reason they still run when you cast fear on them . instinct , maybe ? a desire to blend in ?

2014-03-11.name: Inner Demon
2014-03-11.rule: give your hero + 8 attack this turn .
2014-03-11.flavour: critical component of any tragic backstory .

2014-03-11.name: Ironbark Protector
2014-03-11.rule: taunt
2014-03-11.flavour: i dare you to attack darnassus .

2014-03-11.name: Mind Control
2014-03-11.rule: take control of an enemy minion .
2014-03-11.flavour: nominated as " spell most likely to make your opponent punch the wall . "

2014-03-11.name: Circle of Healing
2014-03-11.rule: restore 4 health to all minions .
2014-03-11.flavour: it is n't really a circle .

2014-03-11.name: Inner Rage
2014-03-11.rule: deal 1 damage to a minion and give it + 2 attack .
2014-03-11.flavour: they 're only smiling on the outside .

2014-03-11.name: Preparation
2014-03-11.rule: the next spell you cast this turn costs ( 2 ) less .
2014-03-11.flavour: " be prepared " - rogue motto

2014-03-11.name: Shadowstep
2014-03-11.rule: return a friendly minion to your hand . it costs ( 2 ) less .
2014-03-11.flavour: rogue dance troops will sometimes shadowstep away at the end of a performance . crowds love it .

2014-03-11.name: Silence
2014-03-11.rule: silence a minion .
2014-03-11.flavour: reserved for enemy spellcasters , evil liches from beyond the grave , and karaoke nights at the grim guzzler .

2014-03-11.name: Wisp
2014-03-11.flavour: if you hit an eredar lord with enough wisps , it will explode . but why ?

2014-03-11.name: Abusive Sergeant
2014-03-11.rule: battlecry : give a minion + 2 attack this turn .
2014-03-11.flavour: add me to your deck , maggot !

2014-03-11.name: Angry Chicken
2014-03-11.rule: has + 5 attack while damaged .
2014-03-11.flavour: there is no beast more frightening ( or ridiculous ) than a fully enraged chicken .

2014-03-11.name: Argent Squire
2014-03-11.rule: divine shield
2014-03-11.flavour: " i solemnly swear to uphold the light , purge the world of darkness , and to eat only burritos . " - the argent dawn oath

2014-03-11.name: Bestial Wrath
2014-03-11.rule: give a friendly beast + 2 attack and immune this turn .
2014-03-11.flavour: the seething wrath is just beneath the surface . beneath that is wild abandon , followed by slight annoyance .

2014-03-11.name: Blessing of Wisdom
2014-03-11.rule: choose a minion . whenever it attacks , draw a card .
2014-03-11.flavour: apparently with wisdom comes the knowledge that you should probably be attacking every turn .

2014-03-11.name: Blood Imp
2014-03-11.rule: [ x ] stealth . at the end of your turn , give another random friendly minion + 1 health .
2014-03-11.flavour: imps are content to hide and viciously taunt everyone nearby .

2014-03-11.name: Bloodsail Corsair
2014-03-11.rule: [ x ] battlecry : remove 1 durability from your opponent 's weapon .
2014-03-11.flavour: every pirate uses the same four digits to access automated gold dispensers . it 's called the " pirate 's code " .

2014-03-11.name: Call of the Void
2014-03-11.rule: add a random demon to your hand .
2014-03-11.flavour: " marco ! " " polo ! " " marco ! " " who dares summon me ? ! "

2014-03-11.name: Dust Devil
2014-03-11.rule: windfury . overload : ( 2 )
2014-03-11.flavour: westfall is full of dust devils . and buzzards . and crazed golems . and pirates . why does anyone live here ?

2014-03-11.name: Earth Shock
2014-03-11.rule: silence a minion , then deal 1 damage to it .
2014-03-11.flavour: earth shock ? should n't it be " azeroth shock " ?

2014-03-11.name: Eye for an Eye
2014-03-11.rule: secret : when your hero takes damage , deal that much damage to the enemy hero .
2014-03-11.flavour: justice sometimes takes the form of a closed fist into a soft cheek .

2014-03-11.name: Flame Imp
2014-03-11.rule: battlecry : deal 3 damage to your hero .
2014-03-11.flavour: imps like being on fire . they just do .

2014-03-11.name: Forked Lightning
2014-03-11.rule: deal 2 damage to 2 random enemy minions . overload : ( 2 )
2014-03-11.flavour: if you combine it with spooned lightning and knived lightning , you have the full dining set .

2014-03-11.name: Hungry Crab
2014-03-11.rule: battlecry : destroy a murloc and gain + 2 / + 2 .
2014-03-11.flavour: murloc . it 's what 's for dinner .

2014-03-11.name: Inner Fire
2014-03-11.rule: change a minion 's attack to be equal to its health .
2014-03-11.flavour: good idea : buffing your minions . bad idea : starting a conversation in the barrens .

2014-03-11.name: Leper Gnome
2014-03-11.rule: deathrattle : deal 2 damage to the enemy hero .
2014-03-11.flavour: he really just wants to be your friend , but the constant rejection is starting to really get to him .

2014-03-11.name: Lightning Bolt
2014-03-11.rule: deal 3 damage . overload : ( 1 )
2014-03-11.flavour: lightning bolt ! lightning bolt ! lightning bolt !

2014-03-11.name: Lightwarden
2014-03-11.rule: whenever a character is healed , gain + 2 attack .
2014-03-11.flavour: she ’ s smaller than her sisters mediumwarden and heavywarden .

2014-03-11.name: Murloc Tidecaller
2014-03-11.rule: whenever you summon a murloc , gain + 1 attack .
2014-03-11.flavour: this guy gets crazy strong at family reunions .

2014-03-11.name: Noble Sacrifice
2014-03-11.rule: secret : when an enemy attacks , summon a 2 / 1 defender as the new target .
2014-03-11.flavour: we will always remember you , " defender ! "

2014-03-11.name: Pilfer
2014-03-11.rule: add a random card from another class to your hand .
2014-03-11.flavour: the class is always greener on the other side of the board .

2014-03-11.name: Redemption
2014-03-11.rule: secret : when a friendly minion dies , return it to life with 1 health .
2014-03-11.flavour: i am not sure how you get demptioned the first time . it ’ s a mystery !

2014-03-11.name: Repentance
2014-03-11.rule: secret : after your opponent plays a minion , reduce its health to 1 .
2014-03-11.flavour: repentance often comes in the moment before obliteration . curious .

2014-03-11.name: Savagery
2014-03-11.rule: deal damage equal to your hero 's attack to a minion .
2014-03-11.flavour: it is true that some druids are savage , but others still enjoy a quiet moment and a spot of tea .

2014-03-11.name: Scarlet Subjugator
2014-03-11.rule: battlecry : give an enemy minion - 2 attack until your next turn .
2014-03-11.flavour: at the scarlet monastery , he learned the sacred art of kicking people when they 're up .

2014-03-11.name: Secretkeeper
2014-03-11.rule: whenever a secret is played , gain + 1 / + 1 .
2014-03-11.flavour: where is mankrik ’ s wife ? she ’ ll never tell .

2014-03-11.name: Shield Slam
2014-03-11.rule: deal 1 damage to a minion for each armor you have .
2014-03-11.flavour: " what is a better weapon ? the sharp one your enemies expect , or the blunt one they ignore ? " - the art of warrior , chapter 9

2014-03-11.name: Shieldbearer
2014-03-11.rule: taunt
2014-03-11.flavour: have you seen the size of the shields in this game ? ? this is no easy job .

2014-03-11.name: Southsea Deckhand
2014-03-11.rule: has charge while you have a weapon equipped .
2014-03-11.flavour: pirates are into this new fad called " planking " .

2014-03-11.name: Tome of Intellect
2014-03-11.rule: add a random mage spell to your hand .
2014-03-11.flavour: just a compilation of napkins of intellect .

2014-03-11.name: Upgrade!
2014-03-11.rule: if you have a weapon , give it + 1 / + 1 . otherwise equip a 1 / 3 weapon .
2014-03-11.flavour: easily worth 50 dkp .

2014-03-11.name: Worgen Infiltrator
2014-03-11.rule: stealth
2014-03-11.flavour: if you want to stop a worgen from infiltrating , just yell , " no ! bad boy ! "

2014-03-11.name: Young Dragonhawk
2014-03-11.rule: windfury
2014-03-11.flavour: they were the inspiration for the championship taurenball team : the dragonhawks .

2014-03-11.name: Young Priestess
2014-03-11.rule: at the end of your turn , give another random friendly minion + 1 health .
2014-03-11.flavour: she ca n't wait to learn power word : fortitude rank 2 .

2014-03-11.name: Amani Berserker
2014-03-11.rule: has + 3 attack while damaged .
2014-03-11.flavour: if an amani berserker asks " joo lookin ' at me ? ! " , the correct response is " nah , mon " .

2014-03-11.name: Ancestral Spirit
2014-03-11.rule: give a minion " deathrattle : resummon this minion . "
2014-03-11.flavour: it was just a flesh wound .

2014-03-11.name: Ancient Watcher
2014-03-11.rule: ca n't attack .
2014-03-11.flavour: why do its eyes seem to follow you as you walk by ?

2014-03-11.name: Argent Protector
2014-03-11.rule: battlecry : give a friendly minion divine shield .
2014-03-11.flavour: " i 'm not saying you can dodge fireballs . i 'm saying with this shield , you wo n't have to . "

2014-03-11.name: Armorsmith
2014-03-11.rule: whenever a friendly minion takes damage , gain 1 armor .
2014-03-11.flavour: she accepts guild funds for repairs !

2014-03-11.name: Battle Rage
2014-03-11.rule: draw a card for each damaged friendly character .
2014-03-11.flavour: " you wo n't like me when i 'm angry . "

2014-03-11.name: Betrayal
2014-03-11.rule: force an enemy minion to deal its damage to the minions next to it .

2014-03-11.name: Bloodmage Thalnos
2014-03-11.rule: spell damage + 1 deathrattle : draw a card .
2014-03-11.flavour: he 's in charge of the annual scarlet monastery blood drive !

2014-03-11.name: Bloodsail Raider
2014-03-11.rule: battlecry : gain attack equal to the attack of your weapon .
2014-03-11.flavour: " i only plunder on days that end in ' y ' . "

2014-03-11.name: Cold Blood
2014-03-11.rule: give a minion + 2 attack . combo : + 4 attack instead .
2014-03-11.flavour: " i 'm cold blooded , check it and see ! "

2014-03-11.name: Commanding Shout
2014-03-11.rule: your minions ca n't be reduced below 1 health this turn . draw a card .
2014-03-11.flavour: " shout ! shout ! let it all out ! " - advice to warriors-in-training

2014-03-11.name: Crazed Alchemist
2014-03-11.rule: battlecry : swap the attack and health of a minion .
2014-03-11.flavour: " you 'll love my new recipe ! " he says ... especially if you 're not happy with your current number of limbs .

2014-03-11.name: Cruel Taskmaster
2014-03-11.rule: battlecry : deal 1 damage to a minion and give it + 2 attack .

2014-03-11.name: Defias Ringleader

2014-03-11.flavour: he stole the deed to town years ago , so technically the town is his . he just calls people scrub to be mean .

2014-03-11.name: Demonfire
2014-03-11.rule: deal 2 damage to a minion . if it ’ s a friendly demon , give it + 2 / + 2 instead .

2014-03-11.name: Dire Wolf Alpha

2014-03-11.name: Doomsayer

2014-03-11.name: Eviscerate

2014-03-11.name: Explosive Trap

2014-03-11.flavour: it traps your food and cooks it for you !

2014-03-11.name: Faerie Dragon

2014-03-11.name: Flare

2014-03-11.name: Freezing Trap

2014-03-11.flavour: this may appear weak at frost glance , but it 's actually a very ice spell .

2014-03-11.name: Loot Hoarder
2014-03-11.rule: deathrattle : draw a card .

2014-03-11.name: Mad Bomber

2014-03-11.name: Mana Addict

2014-03-11.name: Mana Wraith
2014-03-11.rule: all minions cost ( 1 ) more .

2014-03-11.name: Master Swordsmith
2014-03-11.rule: at the end of your turn , give another random friendly minion + 1 attack .

2014-03-11.rule: secret : when an enemy attacks your hero , instead it attacks another random character .
2014-03-11.flavour: sometimes it 's as simple as putting on a fake mustache and pointing at someone else .

2014-03-11.name: Nat Pagle
2014-03-11.rule: at the start of your turn , you have a 50 % chance to draw an extra card .
2014-03-11.flavour: nat pagle , azeroth 's premier fisherman ! he invented the auto-angler 3000 , the extendo-pole 3000 , and the lure-o-matic 2099 ( still in testing ) .

2014-03-11.name: Patient Assassin
2014-03-11.rule: stealth poisonous
2014-03-11.flavour: he ’ s not really that patient . it just takes a while for someone to walk by that he can actually reach .

2014-03-11.name: Pint-Sized Summoner
2014-03-11.rule: the first minion you play each turn costs ( 1 ) less .
2014-03-11.flavour: she 's quite jealous of the gallon-sized summoner .

2014-03-11.name: Rampage

2014-03-11.flavour: minion get angry . minion smash !

2014-03-11.rule: secret : after your opponent plays a minion , deal 4 damage to it .
2014-03-11.flavour: a great sniper hits the spot . just like a delicious flank of boar . mmmmm .

2014-03-11.name: Sorcerer's Apprentice
2014-03-11.rule: your spells cost ( 1 ) less .
2014-03-11.flavour: apprentices are great for bossing around . " conjure me some mana buns ! and a coffee ! make that a mana coffee ! "

2014-03-11.name: Stormforged Axe
2014-03-11.rule: overload : ( 1 )
2014-03-11.flavour: yo , that 's a nice axe .

2014-03-11.name: Sunfury Protector
2014-03-11.rule: battlecry : give adjacent minions taunt .
2014-03-11.flavour: she carries a shield , but only so she can give it to someone she can stand behind .

2014-03-11.flavour: " what do you get when you cast thoughtsteal on an orc ? nothing ! " - tauren joke

2014-03-11.name: Wild Pyromancer
2014-03-11.rule: after you cast a spell , deal 1 damage to all minions .
2014-03-11.flavour: boom baby boom ! bad is good ! down with government !

2014-03-11.name: Wrath
2014-03-11.rule: choose one - deal 3 damage to a minion ; or 1 damage and draw a card .
2014-03-11.flavour: the talk around the ratchet inn is that this card is too good and should be a legendary .

2014-03-11.name: Youthful Brewmaster

2014-03-11.name: Alarm-o-Bot
2014-03-11.rule: [ x ] at the start of your turn , swap this minion with a random one in your hand .

2014-03-11.name: Blood Knight

2014-03-11.name: Brightwing
2014-03-11.rule: battlecry : add a random legendary minion to your hand .
2014-03-11.flavour: little faerie dragons are made of sugar and spice and maniacal vice .

2014-03-11.name: Coldlight Seer
2014-03-11.rule: battlecry : give your other murlocs + 2 health .

2014-03-11.name: Deadly Shot
2014-03-11.rule: destroy a random enemy minion .
2014-03-11.flavour: our ballista operator is effective , but not picky .

2014-03-11.name: Demolisher

2014-03-11.name: Eaglehorn Bow

2014-03-11.name: Feral Spirit

2014-03-11.name: Frothing Berserker
2014-03-11.rule: whenever a minion takes damage , gain + 1 attack .
2014-03-11.flavour: he used to work as an accountant before he tried his hand at berserkering .

2014-03-11.name: Harvest Golem

2014-03-11.name: Ice Barrier

2014-03-11.name: Imp Master

2014-03-11.name: Injured Blademaster

2014-03-11.name: Ironbeak Owl

2014-03-11.name: Jungle Panther
2014-03-11.rule: stealth

2014-03-11.rule: divine shield

2014-03-11.name: Sword of Justice

2014-03-11.name: Tauren Warrior
2014-03-11.rule: taunt has + 3 attack while damaged .

2014-03-11.name: Thrallmar Farseer
2014-03-11.rule: windfury

2014-03-11.name: Tinkmaster Overspark

2014-03-11.name: Void Terror

2014-03-11.flavour: if you put this into your deck , you will lose the trust of your other minions .

2014-03-11.name: Ancient Mage

2014-03-11.name: Arathi Weaponsmith

2014-03-11.flavour: chew your food !

2014-03-11.rule: destroy your weapon and deal its damage to all enemy minions .

2014-03-11.flavour: magi of the kirin tor were casting cubes of cold for many years before cones came into fashion some 90 years ago .

2014-03-11.name: Cult Master

2014-03-11.name: Dark Iron Dwarf
2014-03-11.rule: battlecry : give a minion + 2 attack this turn .

2014-03-11.name: Defender of Argus
2014-03-11.rule: battlecry : give adjacent minions + 1 / + 1 and taunt .
2014-03-11.flavour: you wouldn ’ t think that argus would need this much defending . but it does .

2014-03-11.name: Dread Corsair

2014-03-11.flavour: she doesn ’ t actually walk on the sun . it 's just a name . don ’ t worry !

2014-03-11.name: Windfury Harpy

2014-03-11.name: Ancient of Lore

2014-03-11.name: Barrens Stablehand
2014-03-11.rule: battlecry : summon a random beast .
2014-03-11.flavour: it ’ s never huffer .

2014-03-11.name: Gorehowl

2014-03-11.name: High Inquisitor Whitemane
2014-03-11.rule: battlecry : summon all friendly minions that died this turn .

2014-03-11.name: Siegebreaker
2014-03-11.rule: taunt your other demons have + 1 attack .

2014-03-11.name: Arcane Devourer
2014-03-11.rule: whenever you cast a spell , gain + 2 / + 2 .
2014-03-11.flavour: likes her magic with a pinch of salt .

2014-03-11.name: Gift of the Wild
2014-03-11.rule: give your minions + 2 / + 2 and taunt .
2014-03-11.flavour: the gift that keeps on living .

2014-03-11.name: Grommash Hellscream
2014-03-11.rule: charge has + 6 attack while damaged .

2014-03-11.name: Gruul
2014-03-11.rule: at the end of each turn , gain + 1 / + 1 .
2014-03-11.flavour: he 's gruul " the dragonkiller " . he just wanted to cuddle them… he never meant to…

2014-03-11.name: Lay on Hands

2014-03-11.name: Natalie Seline

2014-03-11.name: King Krush

2014-03-11.name: Malygos

2014-03-11.name: Nozdormu

2015-08-24.name: Holy Champion

2015-08-24.name: Maiden of the Lake
2015-08-24.rule: your hero power costs ( 1 ) .

2015-08-24.rule: inspire : deal 4 damage to each hero .

2015-08-24.name: Wildwalker

2015-08-24.name: Pit Fighter
2015-08-24.flavour: what did the pits ever do to you ?

2015-08-24.name: North Sea Kraken

2015-08-24.name: Aviana

2015-11-12.name: Murloc Tinyfin

2015-11-12.name: Huge Toad

2015-11-12.name: Brann Bronzebeard
2015-11-12.rule: your battlecries trigger twice .

2015-11-12.rule: battlecry : put a 1 - cost minion from each deck into the battlefield .

2015-11-12.rule: taunt
2015-11-12.flavour: fierce monkey . that funky monkey .

2015-11-12.name: Mounted Raptor
2015-11-12.rule: deathrattle : summon a random 1 - cost minion .

2015-11-12.name: Jungle Moonkin
2015-11-12.rule: both players have spell damage + 2 .

2015-11-12.name: Tomb Spider

2015-11-12.flavour: less serious than its cousin , the grave spider .

2015-11-12.name: Anubisath Sentinel
2015-11-12.rule: deathrattle : give a random friendly minion + 3 / + 3 .

2015-11-12.name: Djinni of Zephyrs

2015-11-12.name: Ethereal Conjurer
2015-11-12.rule: battlecry : discover a spell .
2015-11-12.flavour: despite the name , he 's a solid conjurer .

2015-11-12.name: Naga Sea Witch

2016-04-26.rule: combo : gain + 1 / + 1 .
